title: #176: Truth to Power With R.A. The Rugged Man
description:
Thank you for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. Today's episode is the highly anticipated interview with political rapper, R.A. The Rugged Man! WE discuss a wide range of topic such as...
1) the Rap Game
2) Agent Orange
3) Conspiracies vs Propaganda
4) Michael Jackson
and
5) Wikileaks
This was a great no holds barred interview and we totally appreciate R.A. for getting on a flight and making this interview happen.

Please check out our sponsor. Absolute Xtracts: ABX.org'
